backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a blog backend with CRUD operations for posts (create, read, update, delete), like functionality, and comment system, using a Map for storage and enforcing ownership checks for modifications.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: updating the HTML document title and header banner text from 'Family Blog' to 'Family Journey' in frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the React application structure, components, pages, hooks, and styling for a family blog with warm coral/peach theming.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining a neutral grayscale palette with coral accent colors for the design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with page title 'Family Journey' and root div for mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, post detail, create, and edit pages, all wrapped in a Layout component.
frontend/src/components/CommentForm.tsx: Form component for submitting comments with author name and content fields, using React Query mutation and displaying loading states.
frontend/src/components/CommentsList.tsx: Component displaying a list of comments with author, timestamp, and content, showing an empty state when no comments exist.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Alert dialog component for confirming post deletion with warning message, cancel/confirm actions, and loading state support.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with header banner image, navigation bar displaying 'Family Journey' title with home button, main content outlet, and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on blog posts (get all, get one, create, update, delete, like) and comments, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette for light/dark modes featuring warm coral/peach tones, plus typography settings using Georgia and Inter fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Form page for creating new blog posts with title, author name, and content fields, including validation and navigation back to home on success.
frontend/src/pages/EditPostPage.tsx: Form page for editing existing blog posts by ID, pre-populating title and content fields with loading and error states, while keeping author name read-only.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying a sorted list of all blog posts with excerpts, metadata (date, author, likes, comments), and a button to create new posts.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: React component that displays a single blog post with full details, including title, author, date, content, like functionality, edit/delete actions, and a comments section with form.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography settings, container queries, animations, and extended theme properties for the application.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking completed features for renaming the application from 'Family Blog' to 'Family Journey' in the HTML title and layout header.
